name: Swarm Universe
description: A highly modifiable top-down shooter featuring highscore-driven singleplayer challenges and online-multiplayer competition. You get arenas, racetracks, mini-games and various online-multiplayer modes. Plus powerful modding-tools to create your own levels and game-modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® XP Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-530 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia® GeForce® GTS 250 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible Sound Card
